Lesson 5: Fun with Allmaps!

Not feeling like learning the command line interface for Allmaps? Have fun instead!

Allmaps Here here.allmaps.org

üïπÔ∏è Launch Allmaps Here

Find historic maps around your current location!

Go to here.allmaps.org in your browser and, if prompted, allow the website to access your location.

The maps returned are maps that have been georeferenced using the Allmaps platform. They‚Äôre all maps held in digital collections‚Äîfor example, the AGSL Digital Map Collection.

Allmaps Arcade - arcade.allmaps.org

üïπÔ∏è Launch Allmaps Arcade

Put the historical maps back where they belong!

Look at the historic map for clues about the location it depicts. You can view the image again by clicking the white button with the two arrows or by pressing Space.

Find the right location by moving the map with your mouse of with the arrow keys. You can zoom in and out by scrolling or with Right Shift and Left Shift.

Click Submit or press Enter if you have found the right location.

The quicker you are and the better your guess is, the more points you‚Äôll earn.
